title: AnjanAnandam bOdhi candrA
sahitya:
AnjanAnandam bOdhi candrA anupama guNavara jitEndra mAmava


anupallavi

  sanjita bhavabhaya sAgara taraNa svAmi raghunAtha caraNa su-ramaNa


caraNam    shrI karuNAlaya divya sharIra dEva tapana mukha sangAdi shUra
Agama nava para vEdita vIra AnjanEya bhaktAlankAra
